v1.1 update
hxxp://www.flytampa.org/dwl/FlyTampa_Athens_FSX_Update_11.exe

A word of warning... don't update the v1.0 in this torrent with the 1.1 update from FlyTqmpa website (unless of course you're into big X's splatted across the runway). The serial key in this torrent has been blacklisted in the 1.1 update.

For those that have these XXXXX,uninstall Athens.Re-install,go to :HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\FlyTampa\Athens\FSX or where ever flytampa is registered on your pc.Change the last number of the serial,install update and your good to go worked for me. :+)
Forgot to mention,dont click on pokerface links cos his website pages contain TROJANS.Someone BAN HIM Please
